text: <@U02918BKW> If chromebox system doesn't work out, we can use some of these with our Integra supplied phone lines. <http://a.co/7Mw5DuX>
We aren't able to use our current Polycoms.
does this have that same potential?

Josh Seitz
Apr 9 (2 days ago)

to me, Ally, Jenna 
Hi all,
 
This is one of the wireless mic systems that I had in mind as a possible alternative to the ceiling mics. It relies on the 3.5mm jacks on the local computer for microphone and speaker interface, so we’d need to ensure that the Chromebox (if that’s what you settle on) has those connectors. Since its so stripped-down, it may not.
 
<https://www.revolabs.com/products/conference-phones/wireless-conference-phones/voip-bluetooth>
 
Let me know what you think. I may be able to get a sample unit from my rep if you’d like to test it out.
 
Thanks,
 
Josh Seitz
Ohm Systems, LLC
Audio| Video | Data | Surveillance
124 SE 11th Ave Suite B, Portland, OR 97214

attachments.title: Revolabs - Wireless VoIP Conference Phones
attachments.text: Conference phones designed for use with VoIP to deliver clear audio throughout executive offices, conference rooms, and huddle rooms.

text: Ah this looks great! Much more slick.
does that work as a phone?
So would completely replace chromebox system. We still need some system that does video calls.
